import{styled}from"@mui/material/styles";export default styled("span")(_ref=>{let{theme}=_ref;const{palette,typography,functions}=theme;const{white}=palette;const{size,fontWeightMedium}=typography;const{pxToRem}=functions;return{color:white.main,fontSize:size.xl,padding:"".concat(pxToRem(9)," ").concat(pxToRem(6)," ").concat(pxToRem(8)),marginLeft:pxToRem(40),fontWeight:fontWeightMedium,cursor:"pointer",lineHeight:0};});
